FuncDef: The reset l2tp statistics rui command clears L2TP dual-system hot backup statistics.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
During the check and verification of L2TP dual-system hot backup, the reset l2tp statistics rui command can be run to clear statistics, including the number of sent messages, the number of received messages, and information about the last 100 backup messages.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
